channel.title: Auto Character File Saver?
channel.description: Hey guys, my source does not save character files automatically....Only when a person logs out...then only the character file is saved. Can someone tell me how to add it?

item.title: Auto Character File Saver?
item.dc:creator: @Abhishek_Dutta Abhishek Dutta
item.description:
@Abhishek_Dutta wrote:

thx silab and that 120000 is the event interval in seconds?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Character File Saver?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

if u have events enabled on your server:
declare

public void saveGAMEevent() { EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer C) { savegame(false); C.stop(); }}, 30000); }
and in run method (when they login)

saveGAMEevent();

or just add this in boolean process() if u dont have events or dont wanna use hte other way

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastSave > 120000 && !inTrade){ savegame(false); lastSave = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
